name: konstellations
description:
(This game was made for the Games Factory 2 game jam)

Some constellations have gone missing, play with a partner as Aries and Virgo to solve simple puzzles to bring back constellations like Pegasus and Leo, by recreating them using stars

Controls: Aries uses A and D to move and S to create a star bit, Virgo uses J and L to move, and K to launch a star bit. When 2 star bits collide a star is formed!

Enjoy (◕ω◕)
